Posts.Content: What is ER pos? Would this info be in my medical records?
Posts.Title: Premarin Law Suit

Posts.Content: I took Arimidex for 7 years. I was taken off of it June 30, 2014. My side effects weren't bad. Just watching my diet. Arimidex stops fat from being converted to estrogen. Our type of cancer estrogen is the kiss of death. My side effects sudden weight loss and gain.
Posts.Title: Arimidex..may not be working
